classes.name: card
classes.description: Main class carrying the card styles

classes.name: card__container
classes.description: Container styles that all sub-elements fit within

classes.name: card__container--stroke
classes.description: Modifier that sets 1px border on container

classes.name: card__container--shadow
classes.description: Modifier that sets drop shadow on container

classes.name: card__container--fill
classes.description: Card fill new colors

classes.name: card__container--active
classes.description: modifier to set active color of container

classes.name: card__severity
classes.description: element that sets 4px severity indicator on left of container

classes.name: card__severity--wide
classes.description: Modifier that expands severity indicator to 8px

classes.name: card__rich-media-block
classes.description: If image is included, it lives in this block

classes.name: card__rich-media-block--horizontal
classes.description: Modifier for rich media block if layout is set to horizontal

classes.name: card__rich-media-block--vertical
classes.description: Modifier for rich media block if layout is set to vertical

classes.name: card__rich-media-block--bottom-radius
classes.description: Modifier for rich media block if layout is set to vertical and image is on bottom

classes.name: card__rich-media-block--top-radius
classes.description: Modifier for rich media block if layout is set to vertical and image is on top

classes.name: card__title-block
classes.description: Block for title and header text

classes.name: card__title-block--placeholder-icon
classes.description: Modifier for icon

classes.name: card__title-block--placeholder-color
classes.description: Modifier for icon color

classes.name: card__title-block--placeholder-ellipsed
classes.description: Modifier for title header ellipsis text

classes.name: card__title-block--placeholder-text
classes.description: Modifier for title header text

classes.name: card__title-block--placeholder-image
classes.description: Modifier for image

classes.name: card__title-block--placeholder-checkbox
classes.description: Modifier for checkbox

classes.name: card__body-block
classes.description: Block for card body content

classes.name: card__body-block--placeholder-number
classes.description: Card body block for placeholder number

classes.name: card__body-block--placeholder-text
classes.description: Card body block for placeholder text

classes.name: card__action-block
classes.description: Block for interactive elements like buttons and icons

classes.name: card__utility-header
classes.description: Block

classes.name: card__utility-header--placeholder
classes.description: for optional space for icon etc

classes.name: card__utility-body
classes.description: Block

classes.name: card__utility-body--placeholder
classes.description: for optional space for icon/text

classes.name: card__button
classes.description: If interaction is desired on the entire card, a button element is added that wraps the entire card

classes.name: card__container--stroke
classes.description: modifier that sets box shadow on focus of container

classes.name: card__container--shadow
classes.description: modifier that sets box shadow on focus of container

classes.name: card__image-block--icon
classes.description: for preview icon

classes.name: card__image-block--expand-icon
classes.description: to set icon background color

classes.name: card__image-block--icon-left
classes.description: for expansion icon position

classes.name: card__device-block-text
classes.description: for preview icon

classes.name: card__device-block-text-color
classes.description: to set the card header text color

classes.name: card__device-block-border-color
classes.description: to set the border of card block

classes.name: card__footer
classes.description: Block for title and footer text

classes.name: card__footer--placeholder-icon
classes.description: Modifier for icon

classes.name: card__footer--placeholder-text
classes.description: Modifier for text

classes.name: card__footer--placeholder-no-border
classes.description: Modifier for border

classes.name: card__footer--placeholder-padding
classes.description: Modifier for padding

classes.name: card__footer--placeholder-text-button
classes.description: Modifier for text button

description: **Cards** are designed to be containers for displaying compositions of content and other elements that are grouped into a prescribed and often repeated layout to communicate information and or perform specific functions within the application. Cards are typically positioned within a panel in the UI, with the ability to be combined and stacked as needed.
name: Card
usage:
The primary element styles for the card component are contained within the `.card` and `.card__container` CSS classes. You may modify the appearance of the container by using either the `.card__container--stroke` or `.card__container--shadow` modifiers.

Within the container, there are four optional blocks to display content within - rich media, title, body, and action.
- The **rich media block** is the ideal place to place images. Use the design specs and guidelines for sizing. When using a rich media block, you are also able to choose from two layout options, which can be selected by adding either `.card__rich-media-block--vertical` or `.card__rich-media-block--horiztonal`.
- The **title block** is where you would place headers.
- The **body block** is where you'll put any body copy, follow design specs and guidelines for recommended length.
- The **action block** is where you'll put any elements that are individually interative. Generally this will be either a button or an icon.

You may also change the way that you interact with the card. Should you want the entire card to be clickable instead of elements within the action block, you can change the interaction type to `card`. With this option enabled, a button element will wrap the entire card - adding hover, focus, and active states to the entire card. In future releases, you'll also be able to select the entire card with a checkbox.
